inputs.name: app-name
inputs.description: Name of the Azure Function App

inputs.name: image
inputs.description: Specify the fully qualified container image(s) name. For example, 'myregistry.azurecr.io/nginx:latest' or 'python:3.7.2-alpine/'.

inputs.name: container-command
inputs.description: Enter the start up command. For ex. 'dotnet run' or '/azure-functions-host/Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Script.WebHost'

inputs.name: slot-name
inputs.description: Function app slot to be deploy to

outputs.name: app-url
outputs.description: URL to work with your function app
